name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick QR and Shortcode for any Website.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate Qr, shortlink for current page. Open any webpage, video, Playstore app, App-Store(IOS) directly to your Smartphone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick Qr Generate, shortlink for current Webpage. you can open any webpage, youtube video, Playstore app, App-Store(IOS) directly to your Android or IOS Smartphone in 2 second.

this is still in development extension we love to have any feedback or suggestion to improve this extension.
